txt.en: '[placeholder], we have done much, but we have only delayed the inevitable. While the grodbog-queen still lives, these events can only repeat themselves. No, she must be struck down. That is the only way the insects will stop coming.\n\n'Return to Nud-heden within the Chittering Hole, south-east of here. Venture within, find the grodbog-queen, and defeat her. Only then will we be left in peace.'

'I thank you, [placeholder]. Now we can begin to reclaim that structure and return it to what it once was. Khazad-d√ªm will not be restored to glory all at once, but stone-by-stone, it will shine once more.'
'Hurry! You must destroy grodbog-queen before she lays any more eggs.'
'It is a relief to have those vile gredbyg removed from Nud-heden!'
Nud-heden will never be recovered until the grodbog-queen is struck down.
The grodbog-queen is at Nud-heden, within the Chittering Hole, south-east of the Orc-watch.\n\nAuti is convinced the grodbog-infestation will not be resolved until their queen is defeated.
Talk to Auti at the Orc-watch
Auti is at the Orc-watch, north-west of Nud-heden.\n\nAuti will be pleased to hear the grodbog-queen has been defeated and the insects have left Nud-heden.
